_comment: Company config for Dream Team Flow. Share this with team members. They pass it to: dtf install <REPO_URL> --company-config company-config.json

_instructions.projectName: Your project/repo name (replaces 'Repo' in all files)
_instructions.repoUrl: Git URL for the monorepo (shown during install as default clone target)
_instructions.services: Map generic names to your real service names. Add as many as you need. Keys are the generic placeholders, values are the real names.
_instructions.defaultPaths: Suggested defaults shown during install. Users can override all of these.
_instructions.extraPaths: Additional named paths your team uses. Users will be asked to set each one during install.

frontendApp.description: Path to the frontend app within the monorepo (relative to monorepo root)

backendServices.description: Path to backend services directory (relative to monorepo root)
